hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabr that he entered with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) upon someone who was dying, and the women were weeping. Jabr said:"Are you weeping when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) is sitting here?" He said: "Let them weep so long as he is among them, but if he dies no one should weep for him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ خَانَ غَازِيًا فِي أَهْلِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Betrays A Warrior With His Wife
